data.title: Aleksandr Gerasimov (painter)
data.meta_description: Aleksandr Mikhailovich Gerasimov was a Soviet and Russian painter. He was a leading proponent of socialist realism in the visual arts, and painted Joseph Stalin and other Soviet leaders.
data.text:
